website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a comfortable pair of shoes that you can wear out on the town, to work, or anything in between, these Clarks are the best pick to compliment almost any look.
pros: Tops other Clarks for their styling that looks just as good worn with dressy attire as they do for work or play
Lightweight, comfortable, and fits most true-to-size
cons: A few Clarks fans who have owned Touaregs voiced concern about this newer version's quality when compared to older pairs, but they are still versatile, comfortable oxfords

customer_reviews.title: Awful shoe. Terrible Quality.
customer_reviews.text: This "Vibe" shoe is not the same as the Touareg seen in the 5 star review. As evident by the middle stripe being overlayed instead of inset. This "New" Touareg Vibe version is made to lesser quality. The "leather" appears synthetic and the outer sole is some sort of plastic that is slick and will surely crack before the shoe is broken in. Clarks should be ashamed to release such a product but I guess isn't surprising for a company that has obviously sacrificed quality to save money in both materials and manufacture after moving production from the UK to Asia. Returned shoes before wearing. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Toddius

customer_reviews.title: Don't make them like they used to.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace an older pair, but don't make them like they used to. As mentioned in other reviews, the center strip is outset and not inset. The quality of the leather and build not as good. And, the color is not representative of what is shown in the Amazon product photos.
customer_reviews.author: halebs

customer_reviews.title: I was wrong, great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this three stars because they’re still decent dress shoes. However, Clarks has made a change in the quality of their materials. These shoes don’t look/feel nearly the same quality as Clarks in the past. May have to switch back to Born’s after this pair. *Update* 5/1/18 I've had these shoes for a considerable amount of time. They have lasted through the lousy MN winter, and don't show any signs of needing replacement. I will be buying another pair of these when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: kcm06

customer_reviews.title: Evolving model
customer_reviews.text: I bought this same model nearly ten years ago. When I purchased them again I noticed they had been modified slightly. They have a harder sole that “clicks” on hard surface floors much more audibly. The toe has been accented with a dark color as well. You can see my old shoes that have been worn and polished many times over the years and compare them with the brand new ones (see photos).
customer_reviews.author: Beeton

customer_reviews.title: STOP READING THIS REVIEW AND JUST BUY THEM!
customer_reviews.text: These things are gorgeous! I'm sorry I couldnt order the darker sexier reddish brown, but I am enjoying the heck out of these! They are a much lighter shade than advertised, however that is not a bad thing! These shoes are beautiful, well made, and very very comfortable! I am having a hard time believing these are dress shoes! Absolutely worth the money and then some! I will happily come back to this brand and style of shoe!
customer_reviews.author: A random guy

customer_reviews.title: A shadow of the former Touareg favorite . . .
customer_reviews.text: The original version of this show had nicer leather, a dark leather contract strip at the toe, and nicer materials in general. These have an odd color that make them look like a synthetic material even though the upper is leather. Feels more cheaply made than the older version. I'd gladly pay more to have a better shoe like the original. Listen to your customers! I'm not the only one that feels this way if you do a search.
customer_reviews.author: I Fix Things

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, Casual or Dress
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had them for long, but so far - absolutely no complaints. I bought these to replace another Clarks casual pair. They look great! In fact, I debated on whether you could wear these both casual and dress. The real answer: Yes, you can. My answer: No, because I also got a really cool pair of dress shoes at the same time. It took a few days to get used to the round v square toe. But, I totally dig the look. AND they are lighter than my other Clarks. NOTE: These have a sewn-in pad. It is comfortable and I figure I can toss in a pad over it down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Liquid Frost

customer_reviews.title: 9.5 XW fits like other 10EE
customer_reviews.text: I have several Clarks shoes and they all seem well made. However, just be aware that they run large--at least in my size. I wear 10EE in Asics, Hoka and Brooks running shoes. But Clarks are sized like my Bates boots. Even going down a half size to 9.5 XW, I can still comfortably wear thicker socks. The light brown leather stains with rain drops, which had me worried at first, but it dries without spots. These are very comfortable, and I'm happy now that I've found that Clarks consistently run large.
customer_reviews.author: W. Overton

customer_reviews.title: This is a comfortable shoe. There is no "break-in" necessary
customer_reviews.text: I already own this shoe in black, so buying a pair in brown was a no-brainer. This is a comfortable shoe. There is no "break-in" necessary, the shoe feels right as soon as you put it on. The size is just right. I am usually wary of buying shoes online, because if they don't fit, or if you don't like them, YOU have to pay to ship them back. So, in effect, you're paying $6-$8 just to try on shoes. Could you imagine if stores in the mall charged you for every shoe you tried on? Right, they'd go out of business, fast! I digress. This is a versatile shoe that's wearable for casual or dress casual occasions.
customer_reviews.author: DMc

customer_reviews.title: Simple, but nice
customer_reviews.text: Really like the shoes; they are very nice. I own 3 other pair of various Clark's oxfords. This particular pair is different. They are lighter, the sole does at first feel like it's plastic, but when wearing them the shoes are comfortable. The sole feels slippery while I have them on, but I didn't fall or slip even wearing them in rainy weather. I like the detailing and styling of the shoe and to me, the feels great on my foot. I give these five stars and may buy them in brown as well. I wore them with jeans, but think they would pair nicely with slacks.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe ever...
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth pair of Touareg shoes by Clarks! I’ve worn previous pairs to the point where the sole cracked and have come back to them again and again like an old friend. I’ve read reviews that lament how the inside of the shoe (the footbed?) wears down, but they mention how they’ve worn the shoe a lot... Plain and simple, this shoe rocks! You can beat them down and they still will look great with a pair of khakis or jeans. I actually just purchased a new pair (as exhibited by the photo) and when put up against my old pair, it’s hard for me to choose a favorite. Clarks, please do not stop making these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Naptown Rugger

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy These Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Any wet weather, no matter how light, and your feet are soaking wet. Clark's quality has gone to hell. Never buying their shoes again!
customer_reviews.author: Brendan M Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Amazon was great accepting the return which were still new in the ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are not the original Touareg that I was lead to believe. They are cheap. I am a pilot and have used the original ones because they were dressy enough with the uniform and casual enough in street clothes plus the original has rubber soles which I need. These soles are plastic and the design is close but not the same construction. I wish I could still find the original Clarks but don't buy these! Amazon was great accepting the return which were still new in the box even though I had stored them in the closet past the return date before I noticed the mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm Sluder

customer_reviews.title: Soft and smooth insole. Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes when i first saw them at DSW. These may not be the most stylish pointed shoes that people usually like to wear when they put on a formal suit, but these are more for business casuals or semi formals. Very comfortable, soft sole, light weighted. It feels like i am walking in a cushion. Very nice buy. Not: when i looked at DSW they werw priced over 80$ And they only carried the black color.i just saw the same model and design from Amazon for 60$. I ended up saving 20$. Plus Amazon have these in 4 colors, i got the brown
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Fit Right, Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, classic style oxford with a slight modern edge in construction. Size 10W actually IS a 10W!! Comfortable footbed and excellent construction. These replace a pair of Clark’s brown shoes I have worn for at least 13 years and seem a worthy replacement for the predecessors.
customer_reviews.author: Appinhighlander

customer_reviews.title: Fits snuggly and are sized r
customer_reviews.text: I've had these shoes for all most 2 weeks and I haven't worn them yet because view been contimplating on sending them back. Not because I don't like them because I took my time choosing them before purchasing. My only issues is that in the black, the leather is a bit too shinny for me, almost to the point that you may think it's fake leather or at least a lower grain of leather. The brown shoe to me shows the true quality of the shoe, I just don't need anymore brown shoes. If you have a somewhat wide feet go ahead and order the wide because they do fit snuggly.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Clarks doesn’t mean quality...
customer_reviews.text: I bought thinking Clarks were quality shoes. I wore them 2 or 3 times a week at my desk job. Only 2000 to 3000 steps a day, and they’re falling apart after 4 months. Soles haven’t even started to wear yet.
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: Not your old Toureg
customer_reviews.text: Owned five pairs of the Clarks toureg previously and loved their comfort and durability. New version is a drop in both quality and comfort. Even the two tone brown style seems different. The new pair is lighter but all of the materials feel cheaper, flimsy and the fit is off. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Gou

customer_reviews.title: Clarks comfort but maybe not the usual quality.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of these shoes and the comfort is absolutely Clarks. The soles seem a little cheap, however, and don't appear they will last extremely long. These shoes run big. I normally wear a 9.5 in everything and even my size 9 is a touch larger than most of my 9.5 shoes. Order at least a half size smaller than normal or even a whole size smaller. For 60 bucks it's a good enough deal to take a chance on the longevity. We'll see.
customer_reviews.author: JP Drums

customer_reviews.title: The color is nothing like the picture
customer_reviews.text: The color is nothing like the picture. I was looking for a deep velvet brown, and instead got a light yellow brown. I understand that with leather goods, colors can vary slightly, but this is outside the realm of a variation. This is an entirely different color. These shoes look cheap and are not consistent with all of my previous pairs of Clarks. I expect they will eventually develop a patina of their own, but I still wish the photos on the Amazon product page more accurately reflected the color of the dye used.
customer_reviews.author: MFonz77

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: WoW, totally impressed with these shoes. They look great. Yes, they are pretty shiny, so keep that in mind. On the casual-to-dressy spectrum that makes them lean a little more on the dressy side, but still versatile. Look great with jeans or chinos. These are also some of the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn. They are lined with a soft material and have a great insole! I usually rip out the factory insole and replace. This is unnecessary as these are awesome. Sizing recommendations are accurate. Go down a half size. I wear an 11 and the 10.5 is PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: Blaine

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe. Great price
customer_reviews.text: I'm stunned at some of these reviews. You just bought a dress shoe for $33🤑. These aren't for walking long distances it's a hard plastic sole not rubber.. I just didn't want to spend $200 or more on shoes👞👞 today. They fit great. And look beautiful. I'd be wary of using leather treatments on these shoes because they might not be real leather, but I am VERY satisfied 😁👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer 412

customer_reviews.title: ... somewhat cheaper made the foot bed is not as nice as the old shoes were and the soul is ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoe has become somewhat cheaper made the foot bed is not as nice as the old shoes were and the soul is definitely a lot cheaper made
customer_reviews.author: Jt Ever

customer_reviews.title: Lost heel support after a few weeks of wear
customer_reviews.text: After wearing these shoes for a few weeks I started experiencing a sharp pain in my hips. On close inspection I see that the heel area inside the shoe has already started to erode. I bought inserts from a drug store to correct the problem. Something like this should not happen after only a few weeks. This is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Slippery when not wet.
customer_reviews.text: Soles are very slippery - time will tell if the sole will get some abrasions/grip from walking. Put them on to see if they fit and within thee steps slipped on carpet. Had to laugh, as I had read they slipped on carpet - it’s true. Like the shoes, But if they had rubber soles, they would be a solid 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Padded insole, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and good looking shoes. I wear custom insoles, which normally require taking out the insole that came with the shoe and replacing it with the custom. These shoes have a padded insole which is glued in. So, I had to place my custom insoles in over them. Had I realized this I probably would have order a half size larger, as they are just a bit too tight with the extra insole. The design of this shoe causes it to fit tight across the top of your foot; it's not uncomfortable just a bit too snug. I would definitely consider another pair once these wear out, (but a half size larger!).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these shoes that I have purchased. They are a good value for the price and run a bit wide so they are a good fit for me. These shoes are lightweight, breath well and are very comfortable for walking. They are not a dress shoe in my opinion, more suitable for a smart casual look. Great travel shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Blake ElCamino

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but comes with built in cushion which may or may not be a good thing.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. My previous clarks didn't have a built in cushy sole which had me buy an insert for them. These do which is both good and bad since once the cushion becomes less plump it might require me to get rid of them before the sole wears out. I walked my previous Clarks into the ground (my soles were cracking when I bought these) and I'm not sure these will last as long but it remains to see how long the cushion will be supportive. The shoes run a bit bigger than my previous shoes but that's been fine. Great shoe for the price and would recommend unless you like to buy your own insert.
customer_reviews.author: PizzaRat

customer_reviews.title: The styling of these shoes in outstanding.
customer_reviews.text: The styling of these shoes in outstanding. There only shortcoming is the soles. They are rather thin. I've worn Clarks for more than 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: ERiC

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of this highly-comfortable shoes. I've struggled for years to find a high-quality leather casual-dress shoe that is stylish and comfortable. These check both boxes -- and last for years! I'll be quite disappointed when these are discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Rhising720

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Color. Not matching the picture.
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand what's wrong with Clark's Brown colored shoes. First I tried Dark Tan and then these ones. None of these shoes have color anywhere close to that in the picture. I know that the colors won't match exactly but the variance in color is just too much. Disappointed. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: True Report

customer_reviews.title: Dont be fooled by the nice uppers. Cheap soles.
customer_reviews.text: The uppers are fine, but the soles are really cheap injection molded plastic. This shoe is guaranteed to last maybe a few weeks before they wear out. I know they are cheap shoes, but I paid an equivalent four years ago on a similar Clarks shoe, and they've only now just worn out so I thought I'd try again. These would be lucky to make it the rest of the year, let alone four. I'm taking my business elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like the shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying the same exact Clark shoe for years and I am very dispointed with the new style sole/tread they have changed over to over the past 2 years. It seems very low quality and old sole was much more rugid and aggressive to a degree. These sear out much faster.
customer_reviews.author: Greg S.

customer_reviews.title: seems legit and as good as one bought at clarks store
customer_reviews.text: if you familiar with clarks brand and know your fitting for Clarks shoes then these are as good buy. They feel light and sturdy. little more curvy toe than i am used but can be used for casual as well as for semi professional wear. i am happy with my buy and the price i spent on the shoe compared to local shoe stores
customer_reviews.author: sree

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap. Either Clark's have really lowered their standards or these were knockoffs.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Mom

customer_reviews.title: Classy shoe at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Have been wherein the Clarks Touareg shoes for close to a decade and absolute love the style and fit. The shoes are very comfortable out of the box and look sharp. I work on the beach [weddings] and as long as they don't get hit by the salt water they last a good long time. I have even traveled and did light tourist hiking from Yellowstone to Masada and have no complaints. Super conformable.
customer_reviews.author: MysticWisp

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking black soles. Wide was still snug.
customer_reviews.text: Not quite ‘wide’. Also the black sole looks cheap and plasticy. Not what I’d come to expect from Clarks. Still though, a decent shoe if you don’t need wider sizes and don’t mind the aesthetic of the sole.
customer_reviews.author: Bill T.

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and look. Hard, no traction sole
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 10 and the fit was good. I like the look of this shoe. Can be used for dress casual or w Jean's. They will need breaking in. I don't like the hard plastic soles and these have no grips for sufficient traction but they look good and I needed a shoe for dress casual work.
customer_reviews.author: Dano

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, cheaper than the Unstructured.
customer_reviews.text: Quality made shoe, the inside is made of leather like a more expensive shoes. A little disappointed in the hard plastic soles, I usually wear the Unstructured, and these are around half the price. Over all, I like the shoe and glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Good wide fit shoe
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy a half size bigger shoe to accommodate for their lack of width. These are offered in wides and were true to size. I use them for work where I go between the ofc and the warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: Nonomex

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these shoes and they are very conformable. They are showing wear rather quickly, but not unacceptably so. I believe these are a great choice for the price and may get a second pair in black.
customer_reviews.author: Tntophat

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Shoe!  I returned them
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are of very poor quality, not made of real leather and are very tight fitting on your foot. The material feels like a vinyl, stiff and thin. Not a recommended shoe at all!
customer_reviews.author: DFHOMEAMZ

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE sole
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my fourth pair of this brand and model of shoe. Good shoes for the money. However, the most recent pair I bought had a small squeak from day one. I thought it was perhaps my socks or maybe the insole. After wearing the shoes for a few weeks, the squeak turned into more or quack, much louder, and made the shoes essentially unwearable. The quack is coming from the outsole. There is a defect in the outsole near the toe box area. My caution...if you hear any noise when you first wear them, return them or it may get worse in time.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Although I haven't worn them for a long time, ...
customer_reviews.text: Although I haven't worn them for a long time, I am blown away by the quality, comfort, and style considering the price point of these shoes. They fit very well, my heels don't slip out even a little as I walk. They look gorgeous and actually do make you a slight bit taller. These shoes are now one of my all time favorites because they give you ease of mind and confidence for a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I inspected them upon arrival and they looked fine. Will update if any problems
customer_reviews.text: Though they feel lighter than most Clarks they fit well and my husband likes them. I was concerned about stitching problems mentioned in other reviews. I inspected them upon arrival and they looked fine. Will update if any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Arashi's Mama

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dress, work or everyday shoes!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best dress shoes I’ve ever worn. They are extremely comfortable, especially when worn all day. The leather is sharp and the style is sophisticated. Will be ordering a few more back up pairs and in different colors. Order these now if you’re on the fence, you wil not regret it; they’re prefect.
customer_reviews.author: iBuyStuffOnAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Quality has changed
customer_reviews.text: These are not the same construction or quality of the Clark's Touareg that I bought 4 years ago. Thinner leather used on the uppers. The stripe down the front of the shoe was an inset on the 2013 model. Now it's an overlay. Tight fit. Headed for a return on these.
customer_reviews.author: RonaldE

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I put this shoe on! I literally spent 5 minutes in them and forgot I had them on. But I’m no stranger to Clark shoes. People have different needs and Clark’s seem to do me great!
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Infinitus.

customer_reviews.title: Weird Sizing, Nice Shoes...
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find another pair like the last pair of Clark's I had, but these seemed comparable in price and style. I had to return the first pair I ordered because they were too large (too long). I measure a 12.5D, (which no one makes). I ended up ordering, and keeping, a 11.5E. The length is perfect. They were a bit tight across the top, but I knew that the leather uppers would stretch pretty quickly. They look nice, feel good (very light) on my feet. (I'm a teacher, so 10+ hour days walking around are common...)
customer_reviews.author: Trey Ryals

customer_reviews.title: Great dress shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these exact shoe. The previous pair are still usable after three years but the sole is now separating from the upper. I wear these shoe everyday at the office and they continue to be very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: TNT

customer_reviews.title: Clarks is not what it once was :(
customer_reviews.text: These are not the same as they used to be. A lot of obvious cost cutting measures are apparent, and they just aren't made as well. They fit okay and are comfortable for now, but there is no way these will last like the previous pair. They are an okay shoe, if you catch them on sale. Otherwise, I'm just really disappointed in the quality dive Clarks has taken :(
customer_reviews.author: rallyshark

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My shoe size is usually 26.5 - 27.0cm EE, and I purchased 10 W. Slightly bigger than my expectation though, it becomes best size by adding an inner sole. Leather is soft and it's confortable even in the new condition. Design is also good to use for both, casual and formal.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Have a black pair and a brown pair. I wear them to work everyday (business casual). I also wear them with jeans instead of tennis shoes now because they are more comfortable than my sneaks. And they are nice looking enough that I can get by with wearing them to church with a suit. They are the perfect shoe for me !! I have already purchased a 2nd pair of black and a second pair of brown just in case they stopped making them :-)) Rick
customer_reviews.author: Rick Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Clark’s Touareg Vibe: A Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: Great looking casual shoe that works equally well with business casual, chinos or jeans. True to size and very comfortable - and comfortably priced, too. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: TheRomanticStranger

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoes.
customer_reviews.text: My size is 9.5. I bought that size and they fit perfectly. They are very nice. The padding is a little less than the shoes I am replacing, but still good. I will be buying another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Tpl

customer_reviews.title: Look great but they squeak.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my husband to wear on business casual days. They look good, but his employees can hear him coming from a mile away. They are very squeaky!
customer_reviews.author: MSpeller#24

customer_reviews.title: Not like they used to be
customer_reviews.text: This review does not hold Amazon responsible for quality, or lack thereof. The tab on the rear of the heel is about to come unglued from no more than 20 uses.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fit great. A little snug at first across the top of my feet but that went away after a couple hours of wearing and never came back. I think they're pretty light shoes and don't feel bulky. Nice style and shiny, black finish.
customer_reviews.author: Dionysus Zagreus

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, soft leather, lightweight, and all day comfort. Can’t speak about durability, didn’t have it long enough. But looks and feels durable.
customer_reviews.author: Veer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and light weight
customer_reviews.text: I buy these shoes for my husband all the time. They are a great light weight shoe that's comfortable when he has to be on his feet
customer_reviews.author: 6mom

customer_reviews.title: Extra comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wore this shoes to work all day out of the box. I did not even felt I was wearing new shows. Deffinetly will buy another color.
customer_reviews.author: HC-Foto

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice but or 1 size lower.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes but the wear long. All my shoes are 9.5-10 from narrow to wide. The first pair I ordered was a 10 and it fit longer than an 11. Returned them and ordered a 9 and they still fit a little long but good enough. I think an. 8.5W would have been a perfect fit, but didn't want to go through the hassle of returning them again
customer_reviews.author: Santiago Garcia210

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed!!! Attention to anyone who is concerned about their safety! These shoes appear well made, however, the design does not excuse the sole of the shoe, which is made out of a hard, shiny, plastic material. This makes for an extremely dangerous walk, especially if you live in the Northeast, where ice and snow is a regular occurrence. No way to wear the shoes even on the carpet as they provide no traction.☹️
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Silva

customer_reviews.title: Not like they used to be.. but a nice shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Overall very comfortable for the price range. Time will tell if they will hold up as well as they used to. They've made some changes.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoe I have ever worn! And stylish! Can be worn as a casual or a dress shoe. Love my Clark Toureg Vibes!
customer_reviews.author: newzguy1

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a sucker for a great pair of Comfortable shoes. These fit just fine. They changed the soles and made them more plastic.
customer_reviews.author: DOUGLAS

customer_reviews.title: Lighter Color, Comfortable Shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoe does not look as pictured. It is light tan in color, nothing like the picture that looks much darker. The quality was solid. These are real Clark’s shoes. The supports inside them are like other Clark’s. The sole is plastic, not the leather I expected, but the quality is fine. These are more of a mid-level Clark model. They are excellent for the price offered on Amazon, much more reasonable than I have found in stores. They are much more comfortable than anything else you will buy at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Dan S.

customer_reviews.title: Great young man's school shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I am learning the quirks about show sizing!! this pair was noticeably larger but I did buy with "room for growth" intention. In this case the 1/2 size up was more than expected. Still a very nice shoe-a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Means

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable show... 2nd Pair after wearing the first pair almost daily for 3 years. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: ceeco

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes but wrong color
customer_reviews.text: This are good shoes but ordered brown and instead the brown leather was sent. I ordered the brown, which is a darker shade of brown. The brown leather is a lighter shade of brown, it is ok so kept the shoes. It still is not exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: RECF

customer_reviews.title: Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: I was blown away by the appearance of this shoe. I really like the look. Seems easily watermarked but I will get around that. Nice look....I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Keron D. Brown-Ellington

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I can wear them all day and this is the first pair I've owned. I had been wearing mostly Sketchers for my non-formal everyday wear along with another brand for formal wear. This pair can do all of that. My next pair are going to be Clarks as well hoping they all feel this nice.
customer_reviews.author: R. Reed

customer_reviews.title: My dad's favorite shoes.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time my dad has bought these shoes; he wore out the first pair and liked it so much he bought the exact same thing. They are a nice work appropriate but still super comfortable pair of shoes. Half the people in his office also were these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jameel Khalifa

customer_reviews.title: Order a size smaller!
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear from 8.5-9. So I ordered 8.5w and these shoes I would say are actually 9.5-10. Can’t wear them at all.
customer_reviews.author: william Brockett

customer_reviews.title: The show fits but !
customer_reviews.text: The show fits but the tongue of the shoe is very hard and needs padding. With out padding the show hurts the top of your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Feels great. I am a teacher, and the tile floors get to my back and feet. These do a much better job providing comfort than most of my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mismatch between the left and right
customer_reviews.text: I have been a long time and happy customer of Clarks shoes. The change of manufacture in recent years seemed to cause some quality issues. A bit disappointment on this particular one is that the color is much lighter than it showed in picture. A bigger issue is the tongue on left is about 1/8" longer than the right. It goes right against the joint of my left foot and I can't wear it for a day without loosening...
customer_reviews.author: szforsure

customer_reviews.title: Very dependable brand
customer_reviews.text: Walked miles and miles while on vacation in Japan and Hong Kong, my Clarks shoes are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: JeffFL

customer_reviews.title: Nice Dress Shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very nice looking and I am very happy with my purchase. The toe is a darker brown than the rest of the shoe, and they have the firmness of dress shoes (not casual shoes). The leather is very nice and polishes well.
customer_reviews.author: PH

customer_reviews.title: Clarks Wide are the best fitting
customer_reviews.text: I have to wear wide. Clark shoes are the best fitting wide shoe and most comfortable shoe I've ever worn. I'm fairly new to Clark shoes, about a year and just purchased my 6rh pair. Thank you Clark for providing a great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ggeorgie

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Clark's are one of the most comfortable and lightest shoes I have ever owned. At a size 13, those are pretty big deals. I have owned this style in brown for years and decided to hit the internet to find them in black. I usually have to try shoes on before purchasing and maybe this was easier because I was familiar with the style, but I had no problem with fit at all.
customer_reviews.author: David Scroggins

customer_reviews.title: Walked for miles in comfort
customer_reviews.text: I have a difficult time finding shoes that fit properly since I have wide feet. From the first time I put these on, they have been comfortable. I've worn them walking for 5 miles around the city and they've continued to be flexible and easy to wear. I would love to have a non-leather option that looks just as good, but I'll continue to enjoy the comfort these shoes provide.
customer_reviews.author: threedlou

customer_reviews.title: had similar pair for 5 years
customer_reviews.text: had a pair that lasted 5 + years. had to order the same. comfortable and fits well
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: It fit as expected and it is very comfortable. It works well for what I use it for
customer_reviews.author: G-man90

customer_reviews.title: So good I got second pair in another color
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and for most attire I can get aware with wearing these to work. I opt for more dressy shoes when I wear a full suit. I've tried these with a suit and didn't look right to me but shirt, tie, and sport coat is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny P

customer_reviews.title: Limited to no standardization with shoe sizes
customer_reviews.text: Had to order several pairs, and, eventually gave up and went to a brick and mortar to try on sizes that may fit. Even at a physical store the sizes were wildly off.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed after receiving these shoes. I’ve purchased 3 pairs of these same shoes in the past. The soles of these shoes have been made out of a plastic like material which makes the chance of slipping greater while wearing them. I’m disappointed that quality was sacrificed to make greater profits. I will not be purchasing another pair of Clark’s in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Eskridge

customer_reviews.title: Best Dress Shoes - Underpriced
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Purchased 2nd pair. Very light and very comfortable right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: HTCD

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday office shoe
customer_reviews.text: Wear these everyday, they're comfortable (after a break-in period) and I love the style. Very professional and unique with the center strap down the toe area. So so soon comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Clark's Men's Toureg Vibe Oxford-Black
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. He has wide, flat feet and said they are some of the most comfortable shoes he's ever worn, which is saying a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Ogdenite

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: It’s kind on casual side but Nice shoe with stylish look. Looked for long and finally find the one that fit my need. Price is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Wu

customer_reviews.title: Plastic soles
customer_reviews.text: I read all the other review that were right on. the uppers are high quality but the soles are plastic. Hard to imagine why a company with the reputation of Clarks would want to trash it. When you search for a shoe like this you need something you can walk on hard surfaces with.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Color is deference not good  Quality.
customer_reviews.text: This "Vibe" shoe is not the same as the Touareg seen in the 5 star review. As evident by the middle stripe being overlayed instead of inset. This "New" Touareg Vibe version is made to lesser quality. Ooler is deference.
customer_reviews.author: Ali nassari

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, really comfortable and great looking. Will be buying these again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Guitar

customer_reviews.title: Dependable & Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Been wearing this model Touareg for several years. Always ordered black but tried the brown this time for a change and it was a nice change. Can wear them with a suit, dress them down with jeans. I particularly like the rounded toe box that provides more room and comfort. Get about 8 months of constant wear out of a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Fryer

customer_reviews.title: It's too bad that I bought these a few months ago and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have literally wore this shoe 10 times and the stitching has completely came apart. Total Junk Shoe. I'll never by another clark shoe. It's too bad that I bought these a few months ago and can't return now. DO NOT BUY. THE QUALITY OF CLARK SHOES HAS BECOME TERRIBLE.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, style, and value
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very well made and are also very comfortable. I can wear these all day at work, look professional, and not feel like my feet are going to fall off. The only issue that I have is that these shoes are much lighter in color than advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are good looking, but they sure make my legs ache ...
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to explain, but the balance of these shoes is certainly different than anything I have ever had. They are good looking, but they sure make my legs ache like no other shoes have done. I hope they break in before too long. I want to like them, but I am a little iffy on them at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Neil R.

customer_reviews.title: Fits just like a brown pair he has
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves these shoes. He couldn't find them in stores. Fits just like a brown pair he has.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Bought them again
customer_reviews.text: This is a repeat putchase. Liked them so much I hot them in brown a d black this time
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Spinks

product_meta.title: Clarks Men's Touareg Vibe Oxford
product_meta.description:
Comfortable mens casual

Clarks has been in business for over 100 years making very fine men's dress shoes in a variety of styles. Featuring a wide range of top-quality components, Clarks gives you the options you desire in the quality you demand.
